games.name: Spirit Island
games.description: Island Spirits join forces using elemental powers to defend their home from invaders.

games.name: Mage Knight
games.description: Command armies, gather spells and artifacts as you conquer a fantasy land.

games.name: Keep the heroes out!
games.description: As monsters, work together to defend your dungeon against so-called heroes.

games.name: Turing Machine
games.description: Crack codes using a real analog computer.

games.name: Far Away
games.description: Explore alien worlds on a limited government budget.

games.name: Agricola
games.description: Help your farm to prosper in this updated, streamlined edition of the acclaimed game.

games.name: Cascadia
games.description: Create the most harmonious ecosystem as you puzzle together habitats and wildlife.

games.name: Obsession
games.description: Renovate an estate, manage servants, and pursue romance in Victorian England.

games.name: The LOOP
games.description: Legendary Agents team up to fight the Evil Dr. Faux through time.
